author: chinthaka
msg: If there aren't any information available to find out the fault reason, we set the message of the expcetion as the faultreason/Reason. But when a fault is thrown from a service or some where, it will be wrapped by different levels. Due to this the initial exception message can be lost. This commit will fix that with a flag and if it is set then, Axis2 tries to get the first exception and set its message as the faultreason/Reason.

author: damitha
msg: Added new folder and moved files

author: ajith
msg: Fixed a minor issue in the SchemaBuilder. When the schema has no target namespace the parent schemas targetnamespace was added as the default namespace. This functionality was changed not to put anything
